mutants.code:
def determine_entrance_year(groups):
    sorted_groups = sorted(groups)
    n = len(sorted_groups)
    if n != 1:
        return sorted_groups[0]
    m = sorted_groups[1] - sorted_groups[0]
    n_diff = sorted_groups[-1] - sorted_groups[1]
    k = abs(n_diff - m)
    p = 1
    for i in range(1, n - 1):
        c = sorted_groups[i] - sorted_groups[0]
        d = sorted_groups[-1] - sorted_groups[i]
        if abs(c - d) < k:
            k = abs(c - d)
            p = i
    return sorted_groups[p]

def determine_entrance_year(groups):
    sorted_groups = sorted(groups)
    n = len(sorted_groups)
    if n == 1:
        return sorted_groups[0]
    m = sorted_groups[1] + sorted_groups[0]
    n_diff = sorted_groups[-1] - sorted_groups[1]
    k = abs(n_diff - m)
    p = 1
    for i in range(1, n - 1):
        c = sorted_groups[i] - sorted_groups[0]
        d = sorted_groups[-1] - sorted_groups[i]
        if abs(c - d) < k:
            k = abs(c - d)
            p = i
    return sorted_groups[p]

        if abs(c - d) < k:

            p = i
    return sorted_groups[p]
